title: Point Source Pollutant on a Coral Reef

content.question: Which of the following is a point source pollutant that would likely affect the ecosystem health of a coral reef?

choices.label: Small pieces of plastic washed in by local currents
Runoff of oil from nearby urban highway systems
Oil released from the broken hull of a shipwrecked tanker
Excess nutrients introduced by fertilization of farmland

content.answer: Oil released from the broken hull of a shipwrecked tanker

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
